Package algorithms.trees

Class TDP_Lazy

  • java.lang.Object
    • algorithms.trees.TDP_Iterator
      • algorithms.trees.TDP_Anyk_Iterator
        • algorithms.trees.TDP_Part
          • algorithms.trees.TDP_Lazy
  • public class TDP_Lazy
extends TDP_Part
    Lazy is a variant of Anyk-Part that implements get_successors(entities.trees.TDP_Decision) by popping them from a priority queue. Each time a decision is popped, we store it as the (single) successor of the previous one so that future calls return in constant time. The idea behind this approach is also described in Chang et al. VLDB'15 https://doi.org/10.14778/2735479.2735486.
    Author:
    Nikolaos Tziavelis

      • get_successors

        public List<TDP_Decision> get_successors​(TDP_Decision dec)
        Description copied from class: TDP_Part
        Find the successors of a given decision among the other decisions in the TDP_DecisionSet. The way that successors are computed depends on the variant (subclass).
        Specified by:
        get_successors in class TDP_Part
        Parameters:
        dec - The decision whose successors will be computed.
